text: John Anthony Burns (March 30, 1909 - April 5, 1975) was an American Democratic politician. Burns was the second governor of Hawaii from 1962 to 1974. He almost lost his primary re-election nomination. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Governors of Hawaii Category:United States representatives from Hawaii Category:Politicians from Montana Category:Politicians from Honolulu Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa alumni
title: John A. Burns
